column1: '''Orthrongroth''' is a location created specifically for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]''. It was the oldest and largest [[Edain]] burial mound of the [[Barrow-downs]]. It might have been the burial mound of the [[Kings of Cardolan]] and/or the place where [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]
column4: and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] obtained the [[Daggers of Westernesse]].<ref>{{VGC|SAI}}
